created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the entity was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the entity's most recent update

directory_uid.description: Unique identifier for the license directory. Defines which directory is authorized to sell this offering. If null, the offering is available to all directories. Once assigned, it cannot be modified.

product_unique_code.description: Unique code for the associated underlying product (e.g., app code name, offering code)

type.description: Category of the directory offering. Possible values include: ״plan״ for the main business subscription; ״app״ for marketplace app subscriptions; ״SMS״ for text message offerings; ״staff_seat״ for additional business seats.

quantity.description: The number of items included in the offering

payment_type.description: Billing frequency, such as monthly, annual, free, or single charge

status.description: Current status of the directory offering (e.g., active, inactive)

currency.description: Currency for the price (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

trial.description: Number of days for the trial period. If not specified or set to 0, it indicates no trial period is offered.
